summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HATA Humanitarian website - all functionality working perfectly. Modern hero section with dark theme and glassmorphism effects implemented successfully. Navigation, carousel, back-to-top functionality, and all page links working correctly.
passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with modernized dark hero section
Desktop navigation menu works (7 links tested)
API health endpoint returns ok (200 status)
Back-to-top button appears on scroll and works
External links open in new tab with proper rel attributes
Glassmorphism card effects in hero section
35 elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Partners page displays correctly with gradient backgrounds
Contact page shows contact method cards properly
